message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we split the difference and settle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,250?
